name: Escape from the Little Green Men
name_original: Escape from the Little Green Men
description:
I participated in the Global Game Jam 2021. Tony Li, Keith Wilson, and Jong Yoon were on programming. Eric Horn was on Music and Game Audio. Kyle Solomon did all the writing. I ended up doing Voxel art (first time!). And this is what we came up with!

Here's a link to the official GGJ project page.

Enjoy!

(Due to a Unity ECS issue, this is Windows only .zip. Would've loved to do a build for Mac, or HTML5.)
